critique: The document is a formal executive order amending a previous order regarding the order of succession within the Department of Agriculture. The language is legal and procedural. There is no strong emotion conveyed. A score of 1 is appropriate for all emotions except perhaps a very mild sense of order or control, which might justify a 2 for joy. However, to maintain consistency with the instruction to default to 1 when information is lacking, I will keep joy at 1.
